title: COVID-19 mRNA Vaccines Contaminated by Simian Virus-40 Enhancers and Promoters - What are the Implications? - America Out Loud News
author: Dr Peter McCullough
description: For mass production, the mRNA companies use E. Coli to ramp up huge production of DNA from which the mRNA can be produced. Pfizer apparently used the simian DNA tumor virus SV40 (promoter and enhancer sequences) to upregulate the synthesis of the genetic code. These potentially oncogenic pieces of DNA should be...
